Title: Fair Haired Child
Plot: A 13 year old is kidnapped and locked in a basement by a scary couple with their younger son. During there incarceration in the basement the two children develop a special relationship and try and get through the night.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Walter Phelan,  Jesse Hadock,  Haley Morrison,  Ian Wallace,  Lindsay Pulsipher,  William Samples,  Lori Petty
